reviews.author: Maria G
reviews.review: My husband and I rented a studio apartment on Barkley blvd and we were pleased with how easy it was to move in and out. The office people were friendly at the time we rented from them. (2018)

reviews.author: jack cooke
reviews.review: Rented for two years with ACP. Although it was easy to submit maintenance requests, pay rent, and communicate, parking was always a pain, dumpsters were always overflowing even after being told there would be extra pick ups scheduled, our

reviews.author: Tony Magestro
reviews.review: I've been a tenant of ACP for the past six years of the eight I've lived in Bellingham and they are, by far, one of the best property management companies in the area. With cost of living and rental prices skyrocketing over the past few

reviews.author: Kate Ainsworth
reviews.review: I've only rented from ACP Property Management for less than a year, they are a stellar group of individuals to work with and I have been renting for twelve years in Washington. ACP prioritize their renters' needs when issues arise, they are

reviews.author: Bailey Hill
reviews.review: We rent a place out in Lynden and we have been so happy with ACP! We met Bethany for our walk through and she was so kind and helpful, helped answer all my silly questions and I felt went above and beyond. After about a month of living here

reviews.author: Jessica Ibes
reviews.review: I rented with ACP for 2 years. I had a horrible roommate at some point that Bethany helped deal with, was overall supportive and understanding, and did her best to improve the situation for everyone. Since then they have been super kind,

reviews.author: Helena Handbasket
reviews.review: Claimed to have a company working on fixing a faulty hot water heater. After two weeks of dealing with cold water and having to use friends and family for showering I followed up with the 3rd party plumber to find out they had closed the

ownerResponse.text: Its illegal to allow 2 weeks without hot water let alone anything over 24 hours.  Additionally we are not sure who you are or what a soft eviction is.  I suggest you contact legal aide if this truly transpired.  I think you have an issue  More

reviews.author: Matthew Smiley
reviews.review: I appreciated ACP while I rented from them, but, as is always the case with literally every rental company in Bham, I was charged unnecessarily for cleaning upon moving out.

reviews.author: Cisco Medina
reviews.review: We live behind a property managed by ACP Property Management. There was an issue recently with a portion of our fence being backed into and knocked over. We contacted ACP and spoke with Bethany. She was very polite  and had someone come out

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the review.  We appreciate it.  We strive to do our best in maintaining our properties and doing our best for our tenants!  Again, thank you!

reviews.author: Kyle Lee
reviews.review: After hearing my neighbors got a month to month before leaving ACP properties, we requested the same type of lease after a year. However, Bethany did not authorize the same type of lease for us. Since our neighbors complained about Bethany

ownerResponse.text: Kyle, thank you for your review.  You bring up so many great talking points for tenants especially when a lease is coming to an end. We all know Bellingham is a VERY tight rental market that is why we ask a minimum of 90 days prior to your  More

reviews.author: Nick
reviews.review: Been renting with them for over 4 years now. They always treat everyone fairly, take all tenant concerns seriously, and resolve any issue promptly. Pay your bills on time, treat the place as you would treat your own properly, and respect your neighbors, and you will never have a problem!

reviews.author: Cheri Beri
reviews.review: I would give ACP property management less than one star based on my experience with them. I can only speak for myself and my situation, but  im guessing their protocol doesnt stray far when someone is really in need .  I was in a home

ownerResponse.text: Cheri, It is silly to think we would just move great tenants without a reason.  You were served by the owner months ago, actually by their attorney...  You know why the owner terminated your month to month.  We just do not have time to chase tenants for past due balances.

reviews.author: Erika Yrizarris
reviews.review: They don't even deserve the star. Bethany was hired to manage my mom's apartments in April. Right away she gave an eviction notice to my mom who is a Hispanic U.S. citizen and to the only black tenant. The people above my mom are white drug

ownerResponse.text: There is nothing easy about an eviction.  Its a loss for all involved.

reviews.author: Minnieannie
reviews.review: Bethany is the best manager we have ever had. She is fair to the owners and the renters, that is why we have had long term tenants. She takes care of things quickly and professionally.

reviews.author: Xtoxina
reviews.review: Reading the "positive" reviews sure seems pretty fake to me. I'd say any of the 1-3 star reviews are real. This company is terrible. Got bad ratings on BBB and on google. Numerous complaints, from people who complain about the same things.

ownerResponse.text: Sheena, we're sorry your application along with Andrews & Jordons resulted in a denial last September.  Again, owner does have last say in regards to pets.  We hope you can move on from this.  More

reviews.author: D B
reviews.review: Bethany is unpleasant and unprofessional, in my opinion. She hides her lack of integrity behind "legalese."  We were excellent renters, so don't let any new reviews obscure Bethany's rudeness and surprisingly unprofessional behavior.  She

reviews.author: Nichelle Kelley Sorenson
reviews.review: I agree that CAP doesn't deserve a star at all. I called on Sunday and left a message with the receptionist about a newly posted rental. Got no call back by midday Monday so I called again and repeated the process.  Tuesday again I called

reviews.author: A.
reviews.review: Probably the best rental management company I've ever dealt with! They always fixed any maintenance issues quickly, and aside from some miscommunications and some steep fees attached to the sublet we had to do for a sudden move, we were happy that we got our deposit back pretty much right away.

reviews.author: Tom Butler
reviews.review: GreT management company to work with. Bethany is the best

reviews.author: Nathan
reviews.review: Not worth the hassle of trying to communicate with them, unprofessional and dont care about your time. My business will be going elsewhere.

ownerResponse.text: First, we reserve the right to refuse to work with people.  The language and disrespect that was displayed by you was uncalled for and very unprofessional. I support my staff for the tough choice they made today regarding working with you  More

reviews.author: Erin Dorchak
reviews.review: ACP is a small family run business.  Their app makes it easy to pay rent and make matenance requests.  ACP has a personal quality you can't find with larger rental company.  5 stars :-)

reviews.author: Eleanor Shellstrop
reviews.review: Typical slumlords - they overcharge, will keep your deposit for fake reasons, plus the owner is an anti-masker Karen. Terrible place overall, can't even describe what liars and cheaters they are

reviews.author: Daniel Libertini
reviews.review: Very rude service, the ladies in the office ignored us when we came in. Quickly turned us away without even taking any of our information. Was a very discouraging experience. I will never rent from them. Son-rise and Chuckanut are much better!

reviews.author: Alexander Bullock
reviews.review: Very nice family run local business. I can always call them or text if I need anything. Little bit disorganized due to small number of staff but if you are willing to wait and few minutes and start on stuff a bit early they are very easy to work with.

reviews.author: Wendy Williams
reviews.review: It's easy to use their portal for service requests and to pay rent. I've been a renter for three years and always receive a quick response.

reviews.author: Jordan Neuhauser
reviews.review: The other reviews say it all. Extremely hard to work with, very little respect or communication and not professional in the slightest. Nice properties made worthless by the property managers.

ownerResponse.text: Jordan we understand how difficult it is to have an application turned down, it is unfortunately the guidelines set forth with our owners. It wasn't you it was the 2 cats and bird the owner didn't want. We wish you the best of luck

reviews.author: Paxton Westergard
reviews.review: Extremely kind and helpful staff. Apartments are nice, modern, and seem to be well maintained.

reviews.author: Jose Aguilar
reviews.review: Excellent service  very good people

reviews.author: Tamara Gonzalez
reviews.review: I have been renting from them for 4 years always excellent service

reviews.author: Bryson Lamb
reviews.review: My mom works her tail off to succeed and I feel bad when I'm at her office, and there are rude and very mean people yell at her

reviews.author: Jason Cook
reviews.review: Made a lease takeover process very fast and simple!

reviews.author: Andrew Bethman
reviews.review: Just don't bother with them. Finding a place to live is already stressful enough, don't add dealing with them into it.

reviews.author: joanna dernbach
reviews.review: Very professional. Very responsive.

ownerResponse.text: Unfortunately, In order for our company to perform any sort processing, applications are to be complete with required information and supporting documents. This is why we moved to the next applicants that had a completed applications and  More
